channel.title: Katie Breivik on Astro Data Group
channel.description: Recent content in Katie Breivik on Astro Data Group

item.title: APOGEE + COSMIC =? <3
item.description: After arriving at CCA a few weeks ago, I’m starting on a project with Adrian Price-Whelan and David W. Hogg. We are trying to figure out how to answer the question: What does it mean that APOGEE doesn’t have a bunch of binary systems containing black holes? Barring the obvious reason that APOGEE’s targets are low-ish mass stars and thus unlikely to be companions to BHs and their high-mass progenitors, we think it will be interesting to compare a bunch of synthetic binary populations generated with COSMIC to Adrian’s close binary catalog.
